page.title: 03PENRITH GENERAL HOSPITAL
page.content: It has two{Geriatric}wards with 30 beds in each,6 rooms with 4 beds and 6 rooms with 1 bed.Some have special equipment.There are day rooms,toilets and bathrooms with bath lifts.The {Maternity}ward has 7 beds for mothers having their second or further babies.The{Casualty}Department has no doctors and less serious injuries are dealt with by the nurse.A G.P is called for more serious injuries. Very serious injuries are sent to Carlisle or Newcastle.There is a nursing officer,sisters i/c wards.Staff nurses and nursing auxiliaries.There are cleaners cooks and porters.{Clinics: } Psychiatry,rheumatology,ante-natal, opthalmy,paediatrics,geriatrics, dietician,obstetrics,gynaecolgy,stroke and orthopaedic.The hospital is administered by the East Cumbria Health Authority.
